site.title: Risū & Oak
site.description: Seasonal wood-fired dining in San Francisco

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Established 2026
about.description: Risū & Oak represents the harmony between nature's bounty and the warmth of wood-fired cooking. We source exclusively from the foggy coasts of Northern California, bringing the essence of the wild to your plate.
about.philosophy: We believe in the purity of ingredients and the transformative power of fire. Every dish tells a story of the season.

chef.name: Chef Elena Sato
chef.title: Executive Chef
chef.bio: With over 15 years of experience in Michelin-starred kitchens across Tokyo and San Francisco, Chef Sato brings a unique Japanese-Californian perspective to wood-fired cuisine.
